GartoDialogue: ^GARTO: Welcome to the Great Awafe Cove Temple!
^COSMO: Are you part of the Awafe tribe too? You look different than the guy we talked to a little while ago...
^GARTO: Yes, I’m part of the Awafe tribe! You probably talked to a Navemar… Well, I’m a Marquina - the other half of the tribe!
^CIELLE: Oh cool! Say… who's that person over there in the middle of the temple?
^GARTO: Ah, that’s the Spiritual Leader of our tribe.
^COSMO: They seem to be really concentrated… What are they doing?
^GARTO: She’s listening to the siren songs of the water.
TheRest: ^GARTO: Yeah! Us Awafe have a deep connection with the waters and all bodies of water in this world are living entities.
^COSMO: This leader, are we allowed to speak with her?
^GARTO: Sure thing! Just make sure not to interrupt her conversation with the water spirits.. Have a great day!
